scan_metadata.description: vpc - Compliance Functions Mapping - OPTIMIZED VERSION
scan_metadata.optimization_notes: Intelligently categorized functions by cloud security expert analysis, grouped by service, simplified to 4 clear categories with execution types and remediation effort classification

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks VPC deployment across regions
check_functions.description: Ensures VPCs are deployed in different regions as required

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks trust boundaries for endpoint connections
check_functions.description: Validates trust boundaries for VPC endpoint connections

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks if VPC endpoint for EC2 is enabled
check_functions.description: Ensures VPC endpoint for EC2 is enabled

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks if endpoint is enabled in multiple AZs
check_functions.description: Ensures VPC endpoint is enabled in multiple AZs

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks allowed principals for endpoint services
check_functions.description: Validates allowed principals for endpoint services trust boundaries

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks if VPC flow logs are enabled
check_functions.description: Ensures VPC flow logs are enabled for traffic monitoring

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks routing tables for least privilege
check_functions.description: Validates least privilege in VPC peering routing tables

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks subnet deployment across AZs
check_functions.description: Ensures subnets are deployed in different AZs

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks default public IP assignment for subnets
check_functions.description: Ensures subnets do not assign public IPs by default

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks separation of private and public subnets
check_functions.description: Ensures private and public subnets are separated

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Monitors VPN connection tunnel status
check_functions.description: Checks if VPN connection tunnels are up

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks separation of pre-production environments
check_functions.description: Ensures pre-production environments are separated in VPC

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Monitors network layer penetration test results
check_functions.description: Checks results of network layer penetration tests

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Monitors segmentation control test results
check_functions.description: Checks results of segmentation control tests

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Monitors network segmentation test results
check_functions.description: Checks results of network segmentation tests

check_functions.execution_type: Code Executable - Checks data flow diagram configuration
check_functions.description: Validates data flow diagram for VPC
